article: The Internet is an ocean of knowledge. It can be helpful to people all over the world. This is, in fact, why it has been popula r for so long. And it keeps you up-to-date with all the events that are taking place throughout the world in the form of news, _ and videos. Newspapers are certainly a(n) _ part of this process, but the Internet gets updated with the _ news much faster than newspapers get _ . So the news that you get is much _ . The Internet is also a great way to keep in touch with your friends and family members who live far away. Apart from family and friends, the Internet also forms a perfect medium for business meetings that are held across countries, which has become very _ these days. However, there are also a few _ in using the Internet. The first one is the exposure to some unhealthy contents. This is a major problem that _ parents of all teenagers. The Internet is also a readily available source of video games, _ violent games. Children who are at the age of experimenting may end up getting addicted to some of the games. And the Internet is a source of computer viruses which can be a _ to your computer, and _ your system in the end. _ , it is important to have an antivirus program on your computer.
